name: kMDItemPixelHeight
description: The height, in pixels, of the contents. For example, the image height or the video frame height.

name: kMDItemPixelWidth
description: The width, in pixels, of the contents. For example, the image width or the video frame width.

name: kMDItemPixelCount
description: The total number of pixels in the contents. Same as kMDItemPixelWidth x kMDItemPixelHeight.

name: kMDItemColorSpace
description: The color space model used by the document contents. For example, "RGB", "CMYK", "YUV", or "YCbCr".

name: kMDItemBitsPerSample
description: The number of bits per sample. For example, the bit depth of an image (8-bit, 16-bit etc. . . ) or the bit depth per audio sample of uncompressed audio data (8, 16, 24, 32, 64, etc. . ).

name: kMDItemFlashOnOff
description: Indicates if a camera flash was used.

name: kMDItemFocalLength
description: The actual focal length of the lens, in millimeters.

name: kMDItemAcquisitionMake
description: The manufacturer of the device used to aquire the document contents.

name: kMDItemAcquisitionModel
description: The model of the device used to aquire the document contents. For example, 100, 200, 400, etc.

name: kMDItemISOSpeed
description: The ISO speed used to acquire the document contents.

name: kMDItemOrientation
description: The orientation of the document contents. Possible values are 0 (landscape) and 1 (portrait).

name: kMDItemLayerNames
description: The names of the layers in the file.

name: kMDItemWhiteBalance
description: The white balance setting used to acquire the document contents. Possible values are 0 (auto white balance) and 1 (manual).

name: kMDItemAperture
description: The aperture setting used to acquire the document contents. This unit is the APEX value.

name: kMDItemProfileName
description: The name of the color profile used by the document contents.

name: kMDItemResolutionWidthDPI
description: Resolution width, in DPI, of this image.

name: kMDItemResolutionHeightDPI
description: Resolution height, in DPI, of this image.

name: kMDItemExposureMode
description: The exposure mode used to acquire the document contents.

name: kMDItemExposureTimeSeconds
description: The exposure time, in seconds, used to acquire the document contents.

name: kMDItemEXIFVersion
description: The version of the EXIF header used to generate the metadata.

name: kMDItemAlbum
description: The title for a collection of media. This is analagous to a record album, or photo album.

name: kMDItemHasAlphaChannel
description: Indicates if this image file has an alpha channel.

name: kMDItemRedEyeOnOff
description: Indicates if red-eye reduction was used to take the picture.

name: kMDItemMeteringMode
description: The metering mode used to take the image.

name: kMDItemMaxAperture
description: The smallest f-number of the lens. Ordinarily it is given in the range of 00. 00 to 99. 99.

name: kMDItemFNumber
description: The diameter of the diaphragm aperture in terms of the effective focal length of the lens.

name: kMDItemExposureProgram
description: The class of the exposure program used by the camera to set exposure when the image is taken. Possible values include: Manual, Normal, and Aperture priority.

name: kMDItemExposureTimeString
description: The time of the exposure.

name: kMDItemEXIFGPSVersion
description: The version of GPSInfoIFD in EXIF used to generate the metadata.

name: kMDItemAltitude
description: The altitude of the item in meters above sea level, expressed using the WGS84 datum. Negative values lie below sea level.

name: kMDItemLatitude
description: The latitude of the item in degrees north of the equator, expressed using the WGS84 datum. Negative values lie south of the equator.

name: kMDItemLongitude
description: The longitude of the item in degrees east of the prime meridian, expressed using the WGS84 datum. Negative values lie west of the prime meridian.

name: kMDItemTimestamp
description: The timestamp on the item. This generally is used to indicate the time at which the event captured by the item took place.

name: kMDItemSpeed
description: The speed of the item, in kilometers per hour.

name: kMDItemGPSTrack
description: The direction of travel of the item, in degrees from true north.

name: kMDItemImageDirection
description: The direction of the item's image, in degrees from true north.

name: kMDItemNamedLocation
description: The name of the location or point of interest associated with the item. The name may be user provided.
